name: Duat Neo
description:
You have been trapped inside of the Egyptian afterlife, "Duat";  to escape, you've stolen and harnessed the power of magic to fight your way out.

The powers that govern this world won't let you leave that easily, though... To escape, you must prove yourself worthy and force your way past a god.

Don't get destroyed along the way.

This game was created over an 8 week period, with 20 hours of work each week, by six students from the Academy of Interactive Entertainment (AIE).
